title: Obvestila
new_notification_from: You have a new Notification from %1
upvoted_your_post_in: %1 je glasoval/-a za vašo objavo v %2.
upvoted_your_post_in_dual: %1 in %2 sta glasovala/-i za vašo objavo v %3.
upvoted_your_post_in_multiple: %1 in %2 drugih je glasovalo za vašo objavo v %3.
user_flagged_post_in_dual: %1 in %2 sta označila/-a vašo objavo v %3.
user_flagged_post_in_multiple: %1 and %2 drugih je označilo vašo objavo v %3.
user_flagged_user_multiple: %1 and %2 others flagged a user profile (%3)
user_posted_to_multiple: %1 in %2 drugih je objavilo odgovor na: %3.
user_started_following_you_multiple: %1 in %2 drugih te je začelo spremljati.
new_register_multiple: Število registracijskih zahtev, ki čakajo na pregled: %1
email-confirmed-message: Hvala, da ste potrdili svoj e-naslov. Račun je sedaj aktiviran.
email-confirm-error-message: Prišlo je do napake pri preverjanju vašega e-poštnega naslova. Morda je bila koda napačna ali pa je potekla.
notificationType_new-topic: When someone you follow posts a topic
notificationType_new-reply: When a new reply is posted in a topic you are watching
notificationType_new-chat: When you receive a chat message
notificationType_group-invite: When you receive a group invite
notificationType_new-register: When someone gets added to registration queue
notificationType_post-queue: When a new post is queued
